==Shutting down Fiji==
==Shutting down Fiji==
â
After a tax increase in 2010, the company shut down its Fiji Island offices on November 29, 2010. The next step for the brand could have been a move to New Zealand. <ref>http://www.app.com/article/20101129/BUSINESS/101129015/Bottled-water-firm-closing-namesake-Fiji-business-</ref> <ref>http://www.aolnews.com/surge-desk/article/fiji-water-leaves-fiji-4-things-to-know-about-the-shutdown/19736926</ref>, but the issue was resolved the next day, with Fiji Water accepting to pay a mere 15 cents per litre extracted.
+
After a tax increase in 2010, the company shut down its Fiji Island offices on November 29, 2010. The next step for the brand may be a move to New Zealand. <ref>http://www.app.com/article/20101129/BUSINESS/101129015/Bottled-water-firm-closing-namesake-Fiji-business-</ref> <ref>http://www.aolnews.com/surge-desk/article/fiji-water-leaves-fiji-4-things-to-know-about-the-shutdown/19736926</ref>.
